Candidate :  Nur Syafiqah Mohd Saleh   
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
  
Location:   KL - Malaysia  
 
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
École Nationale Supérieure des Ingénieurs en Arts Chimiques et Technologiques (INP ENSIACET) 
Toulouse Diplôme d'Ingénieur (equivalent to Master's Degree) in Process Engineering  
 
Université Paul Sabatier (Toulouse III) Toulouse Diplôme Universitaire de Technologie (equivalent to 
Associate's Degree) in Chemical and Process Engineering  
 
UniKL Malaysia Franc e Instituation Bangi Pre -France programme, major in Ch emical Engineering.  
 
Languages:  
Manay  
French  
English  
 
 
CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
10/2019 — Present Axens South East As ia Kuala Lumpur  
Position: Technical Services Engineer  
Mainly responsible for selective hydrogenation unit either licensed by Axens and/or using Axe ns 
catalyst. She follow s the unit through all its life, trying to optimize its performances at all times and 
assisting the customer when troubleshooti ng is required. From time to time, she is required to perform 
on-site activities such unit start -up, catal yst loading/activation, equipment inspection . 
 
01/2019 — 09/2019 Air Liquide SIO Center Petaling  Jaya  
Position: Real Time Engineer   
Remotely operating and opti mizing 18 production plants in 8 countries. Responsible to bring continuous 
improvements in term s of safety, production, reliability and efficiency. My day -to-day challenge in this 
job is to identify and analyse any process deviations and propose solutions  to ensure the plants are 
running at their best economical point.  
 
 Internships  
 
Mar 2018 — Sep 2018  DORiS Engineering Paris  
Process Engineer Intern  
Involved in a project launched to minimize over -design and over -specify at offshore facilities, which is 
one of the m ain causes of cost overruns. She contributed in optimizing equipment sparing strategy  (for 
different sub -process) in terms of cost, space and production availability . 
 
May 2017 — Sep 2017 Veolia Water Technologies Antony  
Position: Design Engineer Intern  
Mainly work ing on a turn -key project which was in the execution phase, during which, she has  
contributed in providing continuous technical assessments to optimize and improve process design with 
respect to cost, maintainability and safety.   
 
COMMENT  
 
An ambitious, dynamic and multilingual process engineer with high intellectual and analytica l abilities 
as well as excellent leadership and organizational skills. She endeavo urs to sea mlessly align herself 
with the operating policies of her employer and deliver substantial results on set target at all times in an 
efficient and effective manner wi th minimal supervision.  
 
For further information please contact Julie Smith  on 01695 5 70 696  or email Julie. smith @johnston -
vere.co.uk
